DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to develop an emergency electroencephalogram (EEG) device, StatNet, that can be placed quickly by minimally-trained personnel and interpreted remotely for rapid identification of seizures.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of StatNet Device for Electroencephalogram (EEG) Recordings
DOC.criteria: Adults > age 18 Epileptiform discharges present on routine EEG Open head wounds Medically Unstable
